website_summaries.verdict: If you want to add elegance and sophistication to your home, this is the console table for you.
pros: Console table can double as desk or vanity
Console table design has lower height than some desks
cons: Silver paint may chip after a year or two

customer_reviews.title: i love my new vanity!! BUT  beware it sits pretty low
customer_reviews.text: i love my new vanity!! i decided to build one from scratch and this table was perfect! i love the look, and i put it together myself in 20mins! cons: it's short i'm 5'7 with long legs and my thighs touched the desk, i got some risers on amazon and that made all the difference in the world!
customer_reviews.author: ti

customer_reviews.title: It turned out better than I could have imagined
customer_reviews.text: I used this desk to make a custom Hollywood make up mirror! It turned out better than I could have imagined. Looks like a million bucks 👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This piece was the inspiration for my vanity/closet area. Love it!!! The drawers don't operate that smoothly, but I really don't store anything that I need daily access to in them. Perfect fit for a small room.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyOne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love it! Shipping was fast!! Definitely worth the money!☺️
customer_reviews.author: Style & Grace Inspirations

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this console that I'm using as a vanity. Cane quickly, in perfect condition, and put together besides the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Phillyknockout

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Delivery was quick and very easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Delivery was quick and very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my Make Up Vanity!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new make up vanity! I don’t think it could of came out any better. I purchased only the Vanity table from Amazon. The table is pretty stable however the drawer can use some improvements as they do not slide in and out smoothly, but it’s do-able. The table arrived in a 10 out of 10 condition. No stretches, breaks or dings. I would high recommend this vanity table as you are getting a great deal for the price. Also, I purchased the mirror and chair from Home Goods which is like a TJ Max or Marshall's if you don’t have one in your area.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer s.

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Im a huge review before i buy girl. So i looked and looked and i just bought it. Best purchase ever!! Easy assemble. Took 20 min. Gives you everything to do it with. No problems with drawers. No scratches or issues. It is shorter than it looks so a small stool is just perfect for it!!! Im so happy with my vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmilett

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The table is sturdy and well made. Mine arrived with a broken leg (mirrored part) but I have it in the back where it's hidden. It looks exactly like the pic. The night stands sold on Amazon match perfectly and it is really bringing the room together.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Schlembach

customer_reviews.title: Glammed Vanity
customer_reviews.text: Love it, delivered undamaged and easy to assemble. Perfect for my black vanity set, I didn't want to do a black desk too so this lightened things up.
customer_reviews.author: DL Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!!
customer_reviews.text: I am SHOCKED at the quality of this item for the price. I do not write reviews often but felt inclined for this item. I ordered this a few months ago and waited to see that it would hold up and it has. Great quality and the look is exactly what I was going for. It's the perfect vanity!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this desk. Pictures does no mercy on how beautiful this desk is, which is surprising considering how cheap it is. It is a little low. Buying the clear risers was a great recommendation from other buyers. You barely notice it. It fit perfectly in a small bedroom Bay Window.
customer_reviews.author: T Darling

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table, and took less than 15 minutes to assemble. I used it as a vanity table and it looks great. I did order some raisers because im tall and i wanted to have some space for my stool. Other than that great buy & good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I am so HAPPY with my purchase.. I had been looking for a vanity table on so many sites and I'm so pleased I found this on Amazon.. First off the packaging 📦 was perfect.. I didn't receive anything broken.. secondly super easy to assemble. Third the price was right! I am obsessed with it. I can't wait to move it to my bed room.
customer_reviews.author: L3883Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking to forward to using this vanity but unfortunately I got a defective one (see pictures) very disappointed specially because you expect more of a product when you spend more than $100.00. The vanity was dinged up pretty bad. It had scratches, glue and a little chipped part. I wouldn't purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ines M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Easy to assemble and the drawers are very spacious! I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I love it! I love it! This is exactly what I wanted when I started my room make over. I wanted a mirrored vanity table but not for the price of $500 at a local retail store. I was nervous that it would get damaged in delivery but it was not. It was packaged extremely well to avoid damage. This is very heavy so it would require two people to carry into the house so that it does not get damaged. This was really easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: INTRO

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this piece and I should return it but putting ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this piece and I should return it but putting it together was a hassle opening box was a hassle and I don’t want to risk receiving a more broken one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful desk/console table
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful desk/console table. We fit a printer and our laptop on the top with no problems. The desk is short though, we had to buy a special chair that adjusted down to 16" from the floor rather the chair we'd been using at our old desk which set at 18.5". The drawers are very roomy but they aren't on rollers (which is fine for me, but may effect others purchasing it). Construction could be better for the price....it's a slight step above a wal-mart or target desk but it is very pretty and a much better value then other mirrored desks I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Michaels

customer_reviews.title: It’s sufficient for its price.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the $300 one from the same company but this was almost half the price therefore I just had to settle for this one. I understand how the wood part makes it look a bit cheap compare to having just plain metal but it still looks good. It does feel a little lower, would have been better if it was 2 inches higher. Mine came in undamaged but it does have its flaw. Some wood abnormality and the crystal knob has an extra plastic that sticks out that is sharp. The cabinets are deep enough to put in your hairdryer. Overall I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: jo1008

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Was as close as I was going to get to a mirrored vanity as they usually cost way more. Came with no dents or scratches and I put it together in less than 30 mins. It looks great! The drawers are really roomy and slide fine for me. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This vanity is beautiful and well worth it. It came shipped very well, not a ding or scratch. I've paired it with a Wayfair nightstand set (mirrored), the Hayworth lingerie chest and dresser and it complimnets them beautifully. It does sit low but nothing that a safavieh stool can't handle!
customer_reviews.author: Tamitunes

customer_reviews.title: I wanted and almost bought the Pier 1 Hayworth mirrored desk but I'm so glad I didn't spend the money
customer_reviews.text: This desk is exactly as advertised. I was very nervous that it would come damaged but it was packaged very well. I put it together myself in under 30 minutes. It's not too heavy or flimsy. I wanted and almost bought the Pier 1 Hayworth mirrored desk but I'm so glad I didn't spend the money. It's a steal for less than half the price! I am using this as a vanity and while the legs are not as ornate as the Pier 1 version once you add a mirror and all your things it looks perfect. Buy it you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Meech

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little vanity
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a birthday present from my mom and I love it! It came in 1 box and was not too heavy to carry inside. The vanity was packaged with care and there are no scratches or makes on it. It took about 15-20 mins to assemble and was very simple. It’s the perfect size to fit next to my bed and still leave room. I definitely recommend this vanity if you are trying to save space and love glam
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vanity desk!
customer_reviews.text: This desk is absolutely perfect and the price is amazing. It's sturdy- I use it everyday for makeup and hair. I lined my drawers with scented paper I got at Homegoods to protect the fabric inside and Store all my skincare and makeup in the drawers easily. Like the other reviews mentioned, an upholstered stool or poof definitely works best because of the lower than average height! A chair might look funny next took it because it can't tuck in IMO. My mirror is from IKEA and poof from Homegoods.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: LOVELY
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is a console table, I turned it into a makeup vanity table like lots of other customers. It came perfectly packaged, was so easy to assemble, and no breaks anywhere on any of the mirror panels. However, because this is a console table, and not a true vanity, keep in mind the height. My legs are really squeezed under there (I'm a short 5'2'') with my Ghost Chair. Might want to consider getting some little leg furniture boosts. But really is so pretty! Bonus cat in the picture too. : )
customer_reviews.author: MollyPop

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this table❤️❤️❤️ Highly recommended && also it's short lol but it's really nice. Delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mel from Miami 🌴🌊

customer_reviews.title: Great as a computer desk!!
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful! Came with a few nicks on the paint and the pressed wood was slightly damaged but nothing major. The instructions were slightly confusing. You have to pull the drawers out forcefully to apply the legs with screws. It’s light but very sturdy. I used it as a computer desk and it is spacious for a monitor, laptop and writing space. The draws are deep and holds a 14” laptop. I’m so pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany and Co

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, functional and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Love this vanity table. Perfect for holding cosmetics in two large drawers. Keeps the table looking clean and elegant. Matches my bedside tables. Great furniture line.
customer_reviews.author: Joannie123

customer_reviews.title: Well made and the drawers are deep enough for a table this size..
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mirror furniture purchase for my mirror theme room. Im in love with this little table it exceeds my expectation. I bought other mirror furniture and they seem okay but i was a little disappointed but this one is the deal. I love everything about this table especially that the drawer i deeper than i would expect. The customer service is also amazing. I had a single missing screw and that issue was taken care of right away with just one phone call. Just buy this table okay. If i could give it more stars i would.
customer_reviews.author: Pink8

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vanity!
customer_reviews.text: I should have done a review when I first received it but I wanted to make sure it served its purpose and guess what... it has exceeded! I absolutely love it! I was VERY easy to assemble... I did it in maybe 20 minutes! I get so many compliments and people honestly think I paid several hundreds of dollars for it! If you get it from other places... something of this quality would be extremely expensive so you truly get a bang with your buck! It's well worth it... along with a mirror I purchased from Kirkland's it turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: Necole

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this desk/vanity table. It was super simple to put together---only have to screw in the legs and the knobs for the drawers. I have my Hollywood vanity light set sitting on top. I feel like a princess! I can't imagine a more expensive table looking or working any better for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces..
customer_reviews.text: Although the desktop surface space is small it’s still a great buy for the price! It came well packaged and in excellent condition (no damage). If you’re tall like me (5’7”) definitely get furniture risers, table is on the short size! Overall I am very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: K. Huff

customer_reviews.title: I gave a four star because it's beautiful but one can tell quality is not as great ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave a four star because it's beautiful but one can tell quality is not as great as a higher priced desk.. I guess that being said, you get what you pay for. Drawers are a little difficult to pull out. It's a beautiful item and will keep it.. I got a high quality mirror to compliment it with a nice chair.. The quality of the chair and mirror outweigh the quality of the desk. I do not want to spend more uneccesary money as it will work! Total cost of set up as opposed to buying at PEIR 1 was $400.00.. So I saved half.. NICE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Help!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone have the direct contact for the seller??? One of the legs came in broken. Everything else is fine, but we can’t complete due to one leg being damaged. There is no way that i can return this entire box alone; impossible! Too heavy for me to carry and fit in anything. Please help we need an option to return/replace but have the damaged one returned. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: H. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Loveeeee!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my new vanity. I chose the Amazon Warehouse deal and it said it was missing some hardware-which turned out to be the drawer knobs. I'm going to order two rhinestone knobs and I think that'll look great. It was easy to put together; just screw in the legs with the included bolts and Allen wrench. There's a tiny black mark on the front where it is painted silver but it's really not noticeable and could easily be touched up. The mirrored parts were all unscratched. The drawers are deep and I'll be able to put a lot of stuff in there as well. So happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ANON.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it already
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be used as a vanity for my daughter who wanted an all white gasby theme with mirrored furniture room! Went to pier 1 imports and they were way too overpriced! Bought this at a fourth of the cost! The room turned out great. It's the last room makeovers we will do since she will be off to college. If you're thinking about buying this just do it...you won't be sorry you did❤️
customer_reviews.author: Will.b

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Easy so assemble and elegant look
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vanity with a fear that it would arrive with the glass shatter as I had purchased another one from a different vendor/manufacturer and it arrived broken. But I must say this one arrived PERFECT. The packaging was excellent and the vanity was safe from any shipping mishandles. I opened it by myself and assembled it very quickly. Really love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: cristina p.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, stable piece of furniture I use as my makeup vanity. I hesitated thinking it may appear cheap, but it is a decent quality product. Easy to assemble. Very attractive, and no defects upon delivery. Drawers slide easily. Perfect for a makeup table. Unfortunately, a crack appeared yesterday in the tabletop, and having no idea how it happened, I wish I had put a piece of glass on the top to protect the surface. I would recommend that one does that, and not have to worry about cracks or scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Arteest

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!! I debated on ordering this for a couple of months. I am so glad I finally did. It was delivered within a few days despite saying it had a 2 month lead time. Only gave 4 stars because it is very short. I thought I would be able to get away with it since I'm only 5'3" but I ended up ordering the risers as soon as I had it put together. Assembly was incredibly easy, had it together in literally 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: L. Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead & just buy it already!
customer_reviews.text: Ommmg! I want to scream! It's so much nicer than what I expected. I was afraid it would be damaged because it was coming during the hustle & bustle of the holiday season, but it arrived just fine. It took my husband about 10ish minutes to put together. 98% mirrored. The edges are exposed wood trim, painted silver. It's just beautiful. It will match my new mirrored bedroom set perfectly. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paris Finesse

customer_reviews.title: A shirt person designed this lovely table!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the height of the table. I ended up having to put 2 risers under each leg in order to fit under the table comfortably. I am 5’8” tall. Other than that it is the perfect table to add to a bedroom or other parts of the house since it goes well with almost any other furniture you have in the room.
customer_reviews.author: L.G. Girl

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table but it arrived with the glass on one of the legs cracked. I decided to return it due to having small children and the fragility of the piece. It really is lovely though and Amazon offered to replace it however they were great about doing my return! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B

customer_reviews.title: You Deserve This! It's Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Treat yourself! I'm Very happy with my new vanity! Easy assembly, well packed and no visible flaws! Adds a lot of glam for the money! Drawers are deep and roomy. Saw a similar one for $450, but it had rough cut mirrors and plenty of gobs of dried glue. I was impressed by the quality for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: buymethat

customer_reviews.title: This is the most beautiful table, for an incredible price
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful table, for an incredible price. I purchased this to use as a vanity and you can see from the pictures, it's beautiful and spacious and it's exactly what I've always wanted. Took be 10 minutes to put it together and it's very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but it's LOW
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is using as a make up vanity. Item came in perfect condition. Super easy to assemble. I will say If you use ur as a make up vanity it sits pretty low. So make sure you buy your seat according and measure to make sure your legs fit under. She paired it with a mirror we also bought on Amazon. mirror details : Tangkula 36" Wall Mirror Rectangle Bathroom Beveled Mirror with MDF Frame
customer_reviews.author: Tony M.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it ... Gorgeous little mirrored diva
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth it!!! Gorgeous desk . Glad I purchased this item . Drawers are deep enough to fit what I intended to use it for and did I mention it's gorgeous... Came well packaged and easy to assemble, 10minutes with no assistance. Price was on point HAPPY CUSTOMER'
customer_reviews.author: Dria

customer_reviews.title: Love this little table
customer_reviews.text: Love this little table. I am using it, as many others have, as a vanity table. I am 5'3" and it is the perfect height for me, using a brown tub chair I got from Big Lots. No, the quality I'm sure is not nearly as high as the one everyone compares it to, but then again, neither is the price. To me, price trumped. The quality is not bad, though. It serves its purpose, and does so quite beautifully! I have no regrets purchasing this table!
customer_reviews.author: LeafynotBeefy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely BEAUTIFUL - Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this table twice already, for 2 different decorating projects, and I am absolutely thrilled at the shipping, quality and price, and would definitely recommend it to others! The product itself is of excellent quality, very sturdy and adds a beautiful and elegant touch to any room. I can't believe the price for how gorgeous this table is! It has arrived quickly and without damage on both orders. It's also very easy to assemble, just screw in the legs! I am very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: LOOOOOOOVVVVVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I use it as a vanity with the matching mirror and it gets noticed. It's great quality and looks very expensive for the price i paid in my dressing room. All my friends want to know where it was purchased and assume it was twice as much. They look shocked when it tell them it was less than $300. If you're girly and looking to spice up a room or get organized, don't pass this up. Great storage for makeup/perfumes and nail polish and fashionable as well. Mirrorred furniture are so expensive and this is great quality at a valuable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful table. Even though it is made of wood and mirror, It came with no damage. I have it in a room where the morning sunlight shines through and it gives the room a beautiful reflection.
customer_reviews.author: Judith R. Cox

customer_reviews.title: So happy I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this table. My daughter is 15 and wanted a table for her makeup without a mirror attached. She absolutely loves this table and her friend are jealous when they see it. The drawers hold a good amount. She has some clear makeup holders that we purchased that look great on the table. The table has held up really well, no scratches and the makeup wipes off easy. It wasn't difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Great piece, missing screw
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a beautiful piece for the price. Was super easy to put together and looks great. Two cons: the top of the table was scratched when it arrived AND it is missing a screw for one of the knobs. I've purchased a few from Home Depot but they are too big. Would be 5 stars if the seller would send me the missing screw!!
customer_reviews.author: armon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This piece would get more stars from me if the screws fit properly and there was not residiual glue popping out from behind the glass. It really is pretty but it is held together with 4 of the 8 screws because the holes did not line up correctly. For $180, it should be a little better made. I would not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: shoppinglover

customer_reviews.title: It's stunning
customer_reviews.text: Arrived safely, easy to put together. One drawer didn't have a pre-drilled hole like the other for the knob handle but was easy to drill through to make one. After having mine for years now, I'm still very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amapanda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but desk too low
customer_reviews.text: The desk is absolutely beautiful and functional but a little to low. When sliding in the chair the bottom of the draws would hit my thigh. My height is 5ft 4in so I'm not that tall. I purchased some bun feet from Lowes and drilled some wholes at the bottom of the legs, spray painted the bun feet metallic gray and screwed them on. Walllaah I added an extra 2 inches to the table height.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk, Great Price, Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I love my desk. It is perfect for my office/beauty room. I just move in to my new place and this desk is great for the beauty side of my office. It is meant to be pushed up against a wall not because there are no mirrors on the backside of the deck. But I don't need it there and it is great. Attached you will find picture of desk still working on the room so you won't get a full feel of what I am going for till I do an update review.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Balan

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great makeup table
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great makeup table. I bought this for my wife, added a large mirror against the wall and flanked it with a pair of multi-bulb vertical light assemblies on a dimmer. Makes a killer makeup table. It takes all of 3 minutes to put the legs on. Note: you need to take the drawers out to put the legs on. The drawers are hand-made, like the rest of this table and are not interchangeable. Make sure you know which one goes on which side to avoid swapping them around a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Harris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but cracked leg
customer_reviews.text: I was super super excited to get this! However I am only giving 4 stars because one of the arms of the vanity table did come cracked. I will either try to hide it or buy some acrylic mirror piece to fix it🤷🏾‍♀️ However the table is very beautiful and looks expensive I can’t wait to finish my vanity and will post pics later today. Overall I love it for the price!! I am not finished with building the overall look I’m doing with the vanity but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning! Beautiful! Perfect! Great job on the packaging, no broken pieces, no problems putting together. I can't tell you how thrilled i was when ii got this! I love looking at it every time i walk in my room; I am using it as a vanity. I recommend this to anyone who wants one!
customer_reviews.author: Stixie

customer_reviews.title: Love love LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It came in perfect condition. My husband wound up finishing it, but I got one leg on before he took over. Super easy, I imagine it would have taken me around 20 minutes if that. I’m only 5’0 so the height is fine but I imagine if you’re a few inches taller taller, you will need risers as it does seem a little low.
customer_reviews.author: Addismama

customer_reviews.title: Mirrored table
customer_reviews.text: Love this Table - there was a scratch on the leg when it was delivered but I put the leg in the back so it's not noticeable -
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. I use it as a makeup vanity and it is all that and more!!! Super easy to put together and looks way more expensive then it really is. Very sturdy. I was worried that it might not be tall enough for my chair I planned on using on it but it is perfect. I did however change the knobs to bigger crystal looking ones just because the ones that came with it were super small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vanity
customer_reviews.text: This desk was great I used it as a make up vanity and it was beautiful. I accidentally dropped a couple things on it a few times and never did scratch or break. This would actually be beautiful as an entry table as well easy to put together and all the pieces came with it then knobs are beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dream come true
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile piece. Not mirrored on back but who cares if it's up against the wall. I used mine as a vanity and it has enough room to hold all my junk. I'm messy so I have to whipe it down a lot but that's not a big deal. Easy to put together and the box size was reasonable for an apartment dweller.
customer_reviews.author: WG TXATL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Delivery was fast. I am so happy with this desk. I turned it into a vantiy with a ghost chair and added a mirror to do my hair/makeup. Looks great in my bedroom. It does sit very low, but I bought some clear risers that match as well. You will love it desk.
customer_reviews.author: PhilTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Read please
customer_reviews.text: Would of gave it 5 stars but the pre-drilled holes on one of the legs doesn't match up with the tables pre-drilled holes to attach it! Such an inconvenience! Therefore my table isn't at all secured!!! And you have to pull out the drawers to attach the legs but when u try to pull them all the way out they don't come out! At least that's what I thought...what they don't tell u is there is an attachment inside the drawers(on the top) that need to be pulled out cause that is what blocks them from pulling all the way out! Hope I explained that good enough
customer_reviews.author: Wynter14

customer_reviews.title: The table is small, very small. I attempted ...
customer_reviews.text: The table is small, very small. I attempted to put together and use as an entry way table with a mirror above. I was unsuccessful as the legs would not fully tighten. I ended up packing it up and sending it back. To each his/her own but it was more hassle then worth for me.
customer_reviews.author: two boys momma

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this table for almost 3 years now & it’s been the best thing ever. It has some scratches but that’s because I’ve moved a couple of times in the process but other than that it’s a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Delisa

customer_reviews.title: OMG! Fabulous Find!!!!!!!  Love, Love, Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The price is right, the quality is fabulous. This table looks absolutely amazing in my room along with my Pier One Hayworth Collection. I have 8 large pieces from Pier one, and was looking for one more table to fit along a wall. The mirror is clear, not cloudy like the Hayworth items, but it complements the collection VERY WELL!. It took me 10 minutes to get it out of the box by myself, because it's packaged securely to protect the mirrors. But it only took me 10 minutes to put it all together by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kim JM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for decoration or vanity!
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely in love with this mirrored desk! It was incredidibly easy to assemble, the directions were straight forward and so simple that I was able to put it together by myself. The desk looks very high quality and feels sturdy too. It looks high end yet was so affordable, you really won't find this deal anywhere else. I couldn't be happier with my new vanity desk!
customer_reviews.author: Jen L

customer_reviews.title: This was really easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to put together, and was so carefully packaged. You receive everything you need to build (not that there is much to put together other than the legs to the base) and I was able to do this by myself. Its a really great piece and it looks great. Others have commented on it being a little short, which it is a bit, but I'm not all that bothered by it.
customer_reviews.author: Karloyn K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful!!! Drawers smell like glue, but I'm sure will air out. It is hard to sit under, if using as a vanity (I am) but lifts under the legs will take care of that (others have had to do the same). Very happy with this purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: V. Hodges

customer_reviews.title: I love my mirrored table
customer_reviews.text: I love my mirrored table, it brings everything in my living room together, I use it to showcase family photos. The bottom two drawers are what I use to hold all my junk. or "junk drawer" they are very deep drawers which is a bonus. Shipping was fast and packaged very nicely I was a bit worried that it would arrive with something damaged....but NO everything was easy to assemble and nothing damaged, in the future i may purchase another item from SEI.
customer_reviews.author: RPK A.

customer_reviews.title: the only reason i give it four stars is because the holes to screw the legs on didn't match up to the pre made holes on the tabl
customer_reviews.text: im using this as a makeup table, which, its too small for but still works and is very cute. the only reason i give it four stars is because the holes to screw the legs on didn't match up to the pre made holes on the table so i wasn't able to get one of the screws in and the other went in on an angle and only got about half way in so its not as sturdy as id like it to be, but returning is too much of a hassle. otherwise this is a great console table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table but old school drawers
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Makes a beautiful vanity. It only lost a star because of the drawers. I had a hard time pulling them out to install the front two legs (smashed my finger trying to get one of them out). And they’re not on gliders so they can give you problems at times. Definitely not a deal breaker though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ok these mirrored furniture are back from the dead and so in so I wanted a piece in my house and they're not cheap BTW so if u can't make it custom made then this store is ur best option the price is nice versus the quality . it came well packaged and no damages except a small broken mirror on the leg due to moving and its in the back so no prob . and its glass so .easy assembly too so I recommend this desk/vanity to everyone
customer_reviews.author: mimipete

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful in my room as my vanity; exactly what I wanted it to be. One of the drawer supports was loose and had to be reattached which does point to the fact that perhaps it isn’t the epitome of quality but it was affordable and it is pretty. Plus it was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning! Best price I could find! No cracks or blemishing. Deep drawers! Looks very expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Kustom Event

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough about this table! I had been crushing on it for months and months, and finally decided to pull the trigger and buy it. So glad I did! It's beautiful, classy, and the perfect size! I ordered it on a Monday evening and it was delivered Wednesday afternoon (standard shipping) WOW- that's just unheard of! It was packaged well, and ridiculously easy to put together. I have it all set up now and can't wait to go shopping to find a lamp and knicks knacks for the top. You will NOT be disappointed if you buy this table!
customer_reviews.author: MegMar

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice from 10ft away
customer_reviews.text: The Allen head bolts are way too long. Had to shim each bolt out with 5 to 6 washers that are not provided. Extra cost to myself. Ding in leg was just painted over and shipped anyways. Made as cheap as possible doubt it will last more than a few years. Glass has no bevel and you can see the glue on the edges. The paper thin felt is peeling on the inside, once again just shipped that way. It looks nice from 10ft away. Should have cost $50- $60 not $160. Im guessing they will all be the same if I try and get another one. Amazon needs to have a better quality control on what vendors it uses!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vanity. Its gorgeous. It was delivered quickly and without damages. It was super easy to put together you only have to attach the legs. It is not much lower than my previous vanity i think the drawers are just deeper which takes up leg room. I solved this problem with a nice vanity stool. Which is totally worth the compromise.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely vanity
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this vanity. It's exactly what I was looking for. A couple cons though. The drawers are a bit rough when they open and close. Thought they would be on a track but they are not. Also, when I received the item, the top right corner had a scratch on it. I also noticed after putting the legs on that one of the legs doesn't sit even with the rest of them. Other than that it's a great vanity. Similar to the one at pier 1 at half the price
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE ROMO

customer_reviews.title: Makeup Vanity
customer_reviews.text: I do love it! But just as the other reviewers said before, this table does sit low. You will definitely need a chair or stool with shorter legs, if you plan on sitting with your legs up underneath the table. My package arrive very quickly. Ordered my table a few days ago, and came quickly a few days later. Very fast shipping. My table was package very well. No dings, scratches or missing pieces. Took 15 minutes to put it together. Now, there was a strong paint odor upon opening the box and assembling it. But the scent lasted maybe a couple of hours and was gone. I will be using this table as my new makeup vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Ms_Georgia_Peach

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one just like this for my entry way for a while. Took a chance and ordered this. It arrived well packed, and in perfect condition. It's very pretty, and super easy to put together. Just....Do NOT tighten the knobs too tight. I did when putting it together, although I thought I was careful ( due to reading previous reviewers warning)...I cracked the glass. Be super careful!!!! Fortunately, its only a $14 fix at a local glass/mirror shop.
customer_reviews.author: jacquiilynn

customer_reviews.title: Good vanity table
customer_reviews.text: For the price and quality, I give this 4 stars. The body and legs feel sturdy, but the drawers don't feel very secure when opening or closing. I have to be gentle whenever I open or close them. This was purchased to use as a vanity table, so the size, style, and price were most appealing to me. Overall, I'm happy with what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: amc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what i was hoping for! Came oerfectly packaged with not a scratch or ding to be found. It was super easy to put together, I had it completely done and set up in 20 minutes. I am using this as a vanity and this is perfect for it, the drawers are deeper than they appear which was a major plus too! For the price, you cannot beat it!
customer_reviews.author: LolaRo84BtsnStrg

customer_reviews.title: A chipped knob and one leg that is backwards as they packed to right (or left) legs (depending on the vantage point) was still c
customer_reviews.text: Definitely too short but some risers solved that issue. A chipped knob and one leg that is backwards as they packed to right (or left) legs (depending on the vantage point) was still cheaper that other alternatives so I'm pleased for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: SN10306

customer_reviews.title: i love my new vanity table
customer_reviews.text: i love my new vanity table! looks exactly as pictured! actually, it looks more expensive than what i paid. i will say, do not order the clear chair that is suggested with it, the chair is too tall. when i sit, my legs do not fit under the table. (I'm 5'3'', 140 lbs)
customer_reviews.author: cristina

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and it's a great piece for the price! It was well packaged and in good shape. It took me about a half hour to put the legs on and knobs. Very fast shipping too. You can't go wrong with this as a vanity table or small desk or computer table. Looks beautiful in my bedroom with my white bedroom set. Didn't find it too short at all. Fit perfect with my wicker chair. Love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne I. Kleiner

customer_reviews.title: Great table if you're looking for a makeup table
customer_reviews.text: Great table if you're looking for a makeup table.... I love it. It's the perfect size for my bedroom. It's nice having extra two drawers to put in the stuff I don't use as often. Worked out really well for me.
customer_reviews.author: dgmcruise

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Little short though
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’5” and this comes to my hip. I wish it was a little taller but overall nice.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mcclain

customer_reviews.title: It's my little piece of heaven...
customer_reviews.text: it great everything was perfect except a little part on the mirror glass cornor with paint on it and inside draw lining need more glue.but i got a great deal the lowest price ever on this. built my own vanity mirror to go with it.arrive fast would buy again. i change the knob as well . the glass dresser got at tj max bottom draw had a crack the design sticker what i use to cover the crack. luv luv also got riser. ghost chair and seat .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YES GET IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! ... I was hesitant about ordering it because some the reviews show it being delivered damaged... But NOT MINE! No scratches No cracks and I put it myself which only took 15 minutes! I also ordered the Stack-it to make it a little higher.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, elegant
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Using for makeup vanity. Don't hesitate in buying... If you are trying to get drawers out, theres a clip you have to push down.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Omggggg I love this table just got it after days of waiting and dealing with the ppl from fedex. I'm so in lovvvve! Just had a minor scratch but is all worth it for the price! so amazing! Everything goes together so perfect !
customer_reviews.author: yulissa

customer_reviews.title: Missing handles!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I love the table for my work-in-progress vanity area. It is fully glassed and reflects light which looks especially good at night, and it was easy to assemble, BUT: they forgot to put the handles for the drawers in the package! So I've improvised and put some of my own- tainted glass turquoise pair of handles- they actually look pretty good (I would say better than the ones that it was supposed to have). Still, potential buyers beware: you may end up with missing pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: I Love my new vanity! Thanks amazonP!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I can't say much about assembly because I persuaded my neighbor to put it together for me for a gift card. But wow it looks great! I have it in a nook with a great mirror hanging over it. It really pulls my room together and it's not an eyesore. I would recommend this. OH it's really really heavy when you get it ask for help ladies!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This was by far the most hardest purchase I ever made in Amazon history. I was afraid the table was going to be too short. I am 5'7 and it is perfect height for me . It did arrive damaged, but the manufacturing company promptly sent a replacement piece for the damaged part without me needing to send the entire desk back. Look how great it looks !
customer_reviews.author: Demeta Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and simple to assemble. The first on was cracked but the seller took care of it and sent a replacement immediately. I love it. The scale is a little small and the hight is too low. I'm still keeping it. I am planning to add risers. It is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Henny Penny

product_meta.title: Southern Enterprises Mirrored 2 drawer media console table, Finish w, Silver
product_meta.description: Perfect for any room, this mirrored console table will glamorously complement your home. With its mirrored finish, it adapts to any surroundings without overpowering yet, catches your eye with its unique presence. Shimmering mirror reflects across the composition. The practical size and function works as well in the living room as it does in the bedroom. Finishing the piece off are two drawers with faux crystal knobs. This console table also has a spacious tabletop. Dimensions include: Overall: 39.5" W x 17.75" D x 28.5" H; Drawers: 14.5" W x 13.25" D x 5" H; Clearance: 34" W x 12.25" D x 22.25" H. This one-of-a-kind item weighs approximately 50 pounds and supports up to: 40 lb. (tabletop), 10 lb. (each drawer). Only quality materials and manufacturing will do. Product materials include: Materials: Mirror and MDF. Assembly required. Made in China..
feature_bullets: Elegantly mirrored console table features faux crystal knobs and two drawers for storage and easy access to items
Shimmering mirror top adds depth to the living room, entryway, or dining room
Matte silver finish combines with a reflective mirror composition for effortless glam style
Charming furniture piece is made with mirror and MDF and requires assembly.Drawers measure 13.25 D x 14.5 W x 5 H (inches)each
Sofa table weighs 50 pounds and measures 39.5 inches wide x 17.5 inches deep x 28.5 inches high

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,042 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
